summary.para: Sets the reference rasterizer's race-condition tracking options for a specific shader.

param.name: pShader
param.para: A pointer to the interface of a shader.

param.name: Options
param.para: A combination of -typed flags that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value identifies tracking options. If a flag is present, the tracking option that the flag represents is set to "on"; otherwise the tracking option is set to "off."

returns.para: This method returns one of the Direct3D 11 return codes.

Note This API requires the Windows Software Development Kit (SDK) for Windows 8.

summary.para: Sets the reference rasterizer's default race-condition tracking options for the specified resource types.

param.name: ResourceTypeFlags
param.para: A -typed value that specifies the type of resource to track.

param.name: Options
param.para: A combination of -typed flags that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value identifies tracking options. If a flag is present, the tracking option that the flag represents is set to "on," otherwise the tracking option is set to "off."

returns.para: This method returns one of the Direct3D 11 return codes.

remarks.para: This API requires the Windows Software Development Kit (SDK) for Windows 8.
